title: Date of the contract
explanation: The date is explicitly mentioned as 'dated as of May 28, 2010' in the contract.

explanation: Party A is identified as 'SOCIÉTÉ GÉNÉRALE' in the text, described as a company incorporated under the laws of France.

title: party_B
explanation: Party B is identified as 'CINEDIGM DIGITAL FUNDING I, LLC' in the text, described as a limited liability company formed under the laws of the State of Delaware.

explanation: The text explicitly states 'Specified Entity' means in relation to Party B, None.

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The text directly references Section 14, which aligns with the 'Standard' definition for Specified Transaction scope.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text explicitly states that the 'Cross-Default' provisions apply to both Party A and Party B.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: The text mentions 'reimbursement obligations in respect of letters of credit, bankers' acceptances with third parties and capital leases,' which are typically forms of borrowed money.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: The text explicitly states that 'Specified Indebtedness' shall exclude 'indebtedness in respect of deposits received in the ordinary course of business.'
